The videos were found on social media pl: specifically on YouTube, and were uploaded last year.
Alt News performed a keyword search on Y: which were uploaded last year. They also conducted a keyframe analysis of the videos and performed a reverse image search on Yandex to find news reports that included stills from the viral videos.
The videos were linked to African Swine: ASF), which was rampant in China in January 2019. A report from a Russia-based news website, Amur News Service, mentioned that the video showing pigs being flamed was shot in China and connected to ASF.
